snippet.title: Google Groups \- Re \- data attributes override method attributes - Google Groups
snippet.description: In the Python Tutorial, Section 9.4, it is said that > > "Data attributes override method attributes with the same name.". The tutorial is wrong here. That should be. "Instance attributes override class attributes with the same name.".

Simple Tests Using Exceptions. Usually Python is straightforward, but there are a few unexpected exceptions.

snippet.title: Too Many Requests \- From Guido on mail.python.org - The async API of the future - Python
snippet.description: Just had another read down the thread, Greg Ewing posted a nice tutorial dealing with python's new yield from construct here. This doesn't cover the yield from construct which was introduced in 3.3, i'm still trying to find a good tutorial on that, maybe at pycon this year. 1 point 2 points 3 points 1 year ago.

snippet.title: Pylons Project \- Home
snippet.description: The Pylons Project was founded by the people behind the Pylons web framework to develop web application framework technology in Python. The most important feature of this release is Python 3.2 compatibility.

snippet.title: Webware for Python
snippet.description: Apache connector benchmark. Webware switches to Subversion. WSGI Webware renamed to WSGIKit. Website re-organization in progress. New server and domain.
